评论概述: A good value for what it is.
评论详情: Good value, but not remotely heavy or thick; about the weight of a normal, good quality t-shirt. Very soft and comfortable. I hope it shrinks a bit as the sleeves are very long -- and I have long arms. Otherwise fits as I would expect a US XL to. I'll continue my hunt for a thick cotton, Henley collar shirt that is not waffle weave. In the meantime I'll get good use from this one.
Was damage before delivered

Based on other reviewers, the sizing is a puzzle. I generally wear an XL in shirts that are S, M, L, XL, XXL and so on. As others will appreciate, when purchasing generic sized garments, you know you may have to buy a size larger due to inconsistencies of how these are measured and also, how much 100% cotton may shrink.  I purchased an XXL and the sleeves are 38" long before washing/drying. The torso is huge but oddly, the garment is short. On the plus side, the cotton is very soft and thinner than most T shirts. Bottom line, it will likely end up being a sleeping shirt but for the price, my expectations were low.  FYI I am  6'3"", 200lb, and stuck forever trying on L, XL, and XXL depending on the garment. :-)
Purchased for boyfriend and he loves this shirt and the quality. This is saying a lot because he is very picky. Purchased last year and still in good condition.

评论概述: I didn’t want to take it off :)
评论详情: One of the most comfortable henley shirts I have tried. I didn’t want to get out of it. I went on to buy a few more. Very pleasant fabric, nice fit. Warning: sleeves are long. This works for me, I roll up the sleeves anyway, this allows one additional roll. As the pics clearly represent, this shirt has no cuffs. Which is what I prefer (again cause I roll up the sleeves). I washed the first one two times since purchase, and did not notice any shrinking, or very minimal perhaps. However, I never completely dry the shirts, I leave them just slightly damp and hang to finish drying. If you dry it to death in the machine, I would imagine it will shrink, it is cotton after all.

评论概述: Two different shirts feel like different fabric
评论详情: I bought the oatmeal heather and loved the shirt, so soft and the material felt thicker than a regular t-shirt. I then ordered Navy and received the same style of shirt but much thinner material which is not as soft.  Maybe the heather colors are thicker? I haven't washed either shirt yet so I don't know what happens from here. I did order a larger size knowing that 100% cotton will shrink. Let's hope it also softens up the navy shirt.  Just be aware.
Fits great

Plus The size is true which is the most important factor. Minus Neck size is a little bigger than I would prefer. Unlike most shirts in this style it has no elastic in the cuff. Just a straihtc sew like a short sleeve t-shirt so it doesn't hold in place. Price point is also a little high but that just evrything.

Already have this shirt in burgundy and green.  Those arrived soon after purchase, and I've been wearing them with no issues.  This navy one had a delayed delivery date.  When it finally arrived, I immediately washed it with a regular load.  One of the buttons came off, and the material tore along the placket, making it unwearable.  Upon inspection, the material seemed thinner than that of the first two shirts.  I don't know if the seller is cutting corners to meet demand, but I'm tossing this shirt and going to another brand.  Caveat emptor.
